title: Completed PE Summary - Lephreeto/ Mare Lycium
raw_html:
Vessel name Lephreeto
Category Fishing
Registered Owner & Manager: Jekita Ltd
Port of registry: Plymouth
Flag: UK
Type: Fish catching
Built: 1961
Construction: Steel
Length overall: 31.05
Gross tonnage: 191.13
Date & Time 20/04/03 12:58
Location of incident: High Seas
Incident Type: Collision
Persons onboard: 16 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Ship lost

Vessel name Mare Lycium
Category Dry cargo
Registered Owner & Manager: Hansa Mare Reederei Gmbh & Co KG
Port of registry: Saint John's
Flag: Antigua & Barbuda
Type: Dry cargo
Built: 1999
Length overall: 260.7
Gross tonnage: 40306.00
Date & Time 20/04/03 12:58
Location of incident: High Seas
Persons onboard: 22 crew
Injuries/ fatalities: None
Damage/ Pollution: Minor damage

Synopsis

Collision between Antigua and Barbuda flag container ship, and the UK registered, fishing vessel Lephreeto.

Action taken:

The Chief Inspector of Marine Accidents has made recommendations to the ship managers of both vessels with reference to:

  • The maintenance of a proper and effective lookout

  • The advantages of using an additional bridge lookout, even in open waters and in good visibility

  • The use of automatic detection aids fitted to radars
